reviewText: Don't spend money on this at amazon or any other website.  In fact do not spend money on any literature produced by the watchtower bible and tract society because any one of Jehovah's Witnesses would be more than happy to share this information with you for free.  If you would like to donate money towards the producers of their information you can contact them at [...] in which case at least the money you put out goes directly to the production of more Bible based literature and videos rather than just someone who is completely unauthorized to sell this trying to make a quick buck. It disgusts me that people are trying to make money on information that is available to everyone free of charge if they are willing to contact Jehovah's Witnesses or listen to them when they come to their doors.
